comments.body: Should these also be listed in `run`?

It looks like all of those packages already have run_exports in them, so no need to add them to the run section.
  - zlib: https://github.com/conda-forge/zlib-feedstock/blob/58550035ead47ad3e3e45be33d37fbd9965a5cfa/recipe/meta.yaml#L14-L17
  - xz: https://github.com/conda-forge/xz-feedstock/blob/69aecee111a1a0653e21458b88888421e3ae2f34/recipe/meta.yaml#L16-L19
  - lzo: https://github.com/conda-forge/lzo-feedstock/blob/c6fe241568dcaa3226d5b9633d4b2c45ea814b96/recipe/meta.yaml#L14-L16
  - lz4-c: after conda-forge/lz4-c-feedstock#15 is merged.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@    - lzo
    - xz
    - zlib
  run:
    # Remove after conda-forge/lz4-c-feedstock#15 is merged.
